title: 1940 Chicago Cardinals season
text:
The <a href="1940%20NFL%20season">1940</a> <a href="Chicago%20Cardinals">Chicago Cardinals</a> season was their 21st in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">league</a>. The team improved on their <a href="1939%20Chicago%20Cardinals%20season">previous output</a> of 1–10, winning two games. They failed to qualify for the playoffs for the 15th consecutive season.
Schedule.
Note: Intra-division opponents are in bold text.
